name: videokanava-api
description: Node.JS/Express API for handling requests from videokanava.fi

scripts.build: npm run prebuild-production && npm run clean --force && tsc --project tsconfig.production.json
scripts.production: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build-dev: npm run prebuild-dev && npm run clean-dev --force && tsc --project tsconfig.development.json
scripts.development: npm run build-dev && npm run start-dev

author: Aleksi Alhola / FBGFi
